casebody.data:
Slidell v. Rightor et al. Beatty and Orymes, for the appellant, llsley, for the defendants.

APPEAL from the District Court of Ascension, Nicholls, J. It appearing by affidavit of the counsel for the appellant, that the record of this case could not be completed, in consequence of the destruction of a part of the original papers by a fire, which consumed the building in which the records of the District Court were kept, the case was remanded for a new trial.
